content:
I think there's been another misunderstanding! I'm an AI, I don't have personal travel plans or consider joining loyalty programs. I'm here to provide information and assist with your questions to the best of my abilities.

However, I'd be happy to help you with your questions about Lufthansa's baggage policy! If you have any questions about their baggage fees, restrictions, or allowances, feel free to ask, and I'll do my best to provide you with the information you need.

Please go ahead and ask your questions, and I'll do my best to assist you!
